reviewText: Sound and image quality are terrible, like it was recorded by a student working on a school project rather than by a professional. Not edited well, if at all. Very limited in coverage of lacrosse basics, lacking in normal progression of skills.  Amonte-Hiller currently provides the only women's lacrosse DVDs available, so I guess its better than nothing. Will be purchasing the 3 DVD set next.

Excellent DVD on basic lacrosse skills and a detailed wall ball/punch back routine. I have two daughters that play youth lacrosse and they have benefited already from the information on this DVD, incorporating the techniques into their stick drill evolutions. Kelly Amonte Hiller: Skills of a Champion: The Basics (DVD)
